pull.title: refactor: Remove unused includes from wallet.cpp
pull.body:
This makes compilation of wallet.cpp use a few % less memory and time, locally.

Created in the context of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/28109, but I don't think it is enough to actually fix this problem.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| ACK | [hebasto](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28200#pullrequestreview-1560401063) |
| Concept ACK | [jonatack](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28200#issuecomment-1662369257) |
| Stale ACK | [ryanofsky](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28200#pullrequestreview-1559456848) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with 👎 to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#bitcoin-core/gui/700](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/700) (Dialog for allowing the user to choose the change output when bumping a tx by achow101)
* [#22693](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22693) (RPC/Wallet: Add "use_txids" to output of getaddressinfo by luke-jr)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

> Good job! The circular dependency "wallet/fees -> wallet/wallet -> wallet/fees" is no longer present.
> Please remove it from EXPECTED_CIRCULAR_DEPENDENCIES in test/lint/lint-circular-dependencies.py
> to make sure this circular dependency is not accidentally reintroduced.

🎉

where they are used.

events.message:
move-only: Create src/kernel/mempool_removal_reason.h

This is needed for the next commit. Can be reviewed with:

events.body: Thanks, force pushed to fix the linter and made the commit hash start with cccc

issue.title: Dialog for allowing the user to choose the change output when bumping a tx
issue.body:
Based on https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26467

Implements a GUI dialog for allowing the user to choose the output to reduce when bumping a transaction. This adds the functionality that was added to the RPC.

labels.name: UX
labels.description: All about "how to get things done"

verification.payload:
tree a789fc0ce27ce3951e348dbad1e57f473bfb5f76
parent fa3e188ddaea7bca796d03335f96f788a3775ed9
author MarcoFalke <*~=`'#}+{/-|&$^_@721217.xyz> 1690987350 +0200
committer MarcoFalke <*~=`'#}+{/-|&$^_@721217.xyz> 1691043089 +0200

Remove unused includes from wallet.cpp

This removes unused includes, such as undo.h or txmempool.h from
wallet.cpp.

This requires adding them in other places, where they are used.

Also, add missing includes to wallet.h/cpp according to IWYU.

events.message:
Remove unused includes from wallet.cpp

This removes unused includes, such as undo.h or txmempool.h from
wallet.cpp.

This requires adding them in other places, where they are used.

Also, add missing includes to wallet.h/cpp according to IWYU.

issue.title: RPC/Wallet: Add "use_txids" to output of getaddressinfo
issue.body: (Non-GUI part of https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/562, but without the bloom stuff)

events.body:
> Created in the context of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/28109, but I don't think it is enough to actually fix this problem.

It's a step in the right direction, we're now failing on `45934` sections, compared to `46006` in #28109. However we're still a long way north of the limit, which as I understand it, is `32768`.
